channel.title: Homepage_sections on ICASSP 2026: Human-like Spoken Dialogue Systems Challenge
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage_sections on ICASSP 2026: Human-like Spoken Dialogue Systems Challenge

item.title: General description
item.description: Challenge Call Recent breakthroughs in large foundation models and speech technology have propelled spoken dialogue systems toward more natural and expressive interactions. However, evaluating the true “human-likeness” of these systems remains an open challenge, as existing benchmarks often fall short in capturing emotional intelligence and real-time conversational dynamics. The 2026 HumDial Challenge (Human-like Spoken Dialogue Systems Challenge) addresses this critical gap by introducing two focused tracks: Emotional Intelligence and Full-Duplex Interaction.

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started Please click “Registration” to participate. Further details regarding the challenge will be made available shortly.

item.title: Timeline
item.description: Aug 20, 2025:Registration opens; Sep 10, 2025: The training set,validation set,data synthesis pipeline, and baseline systems are released. Nov 01, 2025: Test set released Nov 15, 2025: Submission deadline for both tracks. Dec 7, 2026: Grand challenge 2-page paper deadline (top 5 teams only). Jan 11, 2026: Grand challenge 2-page paper acceptance notification. Jan 18, 2026: Camera-ready Grand Challenge 2-page Papers Due

item.title: Organizers
item.description: Organizers Eng Siong Chng, Xuelong Geng, GuoJian Li, Guangzhi Sun, Shuai Wang, Shuiyuan Wang, Xinsheng Wang, Lei Xie, Longshuai Xiao, Hongfei Xue, Chao Zhang, Zihan Zhang, Zhixian Zhao
